channel.title: Matthew Iver Loder
channel.description: Recent content on Matthew Iver Loder

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a senior at Rutgers University who is just on the cusp of graduation. While here, I studied Linguistics, with minors in Spanish in Philosophy. I have had an incredible time at school and am so excited to have learned so much about not just my studies, but also about how to be a better person, researcher and traveller. My research in the past has focused on French, working in the Comparative and Experimental Linguistics Lab with Dr.
